mapper.select: select no, att_status, att_enter_time, att_leave_time, att_no from tb_attendence

select count(*) from tb_attendence where att_status = 1 and no = #{no}
and to_char(att_enter_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TRUNC(#{attEnterTime},'MM') and to_char(att_enter_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= LAST_DAY(#{attEnterTime})

select count(*) from tb_attendence where att_status = 2 and no = #{no}
and to_char(att_enter_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TRUNC(#{attEnterTime},'MM') and to_char(att_enter_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= LAST_DAY(#{attEnterTime})

select count(*) from tb_attendence where att_status = 3 and no = #{no}
and to_char(att_enter_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TRUNC(#{attEnterTime},'MM') and to_char(att_enter_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= LAST_DAY(#{attEnterTime})

select count(*) from tb_attendence where att_status = 4 and no = #{no}
and to_char(att_leave_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TRUNC(#{attLeaveTime},'MM') and to_char(att_leave_time,'YYYY-MM-DD') <= LAST_DAY(#{attLeaveTime})
